mapper.select: SELECT k.id, k.user_id, k.settlement_date, k.expense_item_id, ei.expense_item_name, k.expenditure_amount, k.income_amount, k.settlement_id, s.settlement_name, k.used_store, k.remarks, k.insert_at, k.update_at, k.is_deleted FROM kakeibo AS k INNER JOIN expense_item as ei ON k.expense_item_id = ei.id LEFT JOIN settlement as s ON k.settlement_id = s.id WHERE k.is_deleted = false ORDER BY k.settlement_date DESC, k.update_at DESC;

SELECT k.id, k.user_id, k.settlement_date, k.expense_item_id, ei.expense_item_name, k.expenditure_amount, k.income_amount, k.settlement_id, s.settlement_name, k.used_store, k.remarks, k.insert_at, k.update_at FROM kakeibo AS k INNER JOIN expense_item as ei ON k.expense_item_id = ei.id LEFT JOIN settlement as s ON k.settlement_id = s.id WHERE k.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kakeibo (user_id, settlement_date, expense_item_id, expenditure_amount, income_amount, settlement_id, used_store, remarks) VALUES (#{userId}, #{settlementDate}, #{expenseItemId}, #{expenditureAmount}, #{incomeAmount}, #{settlementId}, #{usedStore}, #{remarks})
mapper.select:
SELECT k.id, k.user_id, k.settlement_date, k.expense_item_id, ei.expense_item_name, k.expenditure_amount, k.income_amount, k.settlement_id, s.settlement_name, k.used_store, k.remarks, k.insert_at FROM kakeibo AS k INNER JOIN expense_item as ei ON k.expense_item_id = ei.id LEFT JOIN settlement as s ON k.settlement_id = s.id
k.is_deleted = false and TO_CHAR(k.settlement_date, 'YYYY') LIKE '${year}'
and TO_CHAR(k.settlement_date, 'YYYY-MM') LIKE '${year}-%${month}%'
ORDER BY k.settlement_date DESC, k.update_at DESC;

SELECT SUM(income_amount) AS total_income_amount, SUM(expenditure_amount) AS total_expenditure_amount, (SUM(income_amount) - SUM(expenditure_amount)) AS balance_calculation_result FROM kakeibo
is_deleted = false and TO_CHAR(settlement_date, 'YYYY') LIKE '${year}'
and TO_CHAR(settlement_date, 'YYYY-MM') LIKE '${year}-%${month}%'
